  • Constructor Details

    • ChatClient

      public ChatClient(String host, int port, ChatIF clientConsole) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      host - - saves the data of the ip-address the client entered in order to connect to the server.
      port - - saves the data of the port the client entered in order to connect to the server.
      clientUI - - interface that allows the upper layer of client to communicate with lower layers.
      Throws:
      IOException - ChatClient is a class that communicate directly with the server. is the highest layered class and closest to the sever in terms of layering.
